remarks: The topology induced by a uniform structure generated by a metric ` D ` is generated by that metric's open balls.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Dec-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
statement: psmetutop $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( PsMet ` X ) ) -> ( unifTop ` ( metUnif ` D ) ) = ( topGen ` ran ( ball ` D ) ) ) $.
